mapper.sql: e.id, e.name, e.category, e.description, e.event_data as "data", e.event_date as "date", e.component_uuid as "componentUuid", e.snapshot_id as "snapshotId", e.created_at as "createdAt"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events (name, category, description, event_data, event_date, component_uuid, snapshot_id, created_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{category}, #{description}, #{data}, #{date}, #{componentUuid}, #{snapshotId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select:
SELECT s.id FROM snapshots s, events e, projects p
AND p.id=#{componentId} AND p.uuid=e.component_uuid AND e.name <> #{currentVersion} AND e.category='Version' AND s.id = e.snapshot_id
ORDER BY e.event_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT TOP 1 s.id FROM snapshots s, events e, projects p
AND p.id=#{componentId} AND p.uuid=e.component_uuid AND e.name <> #{currentVersion} AND e.category='Version' AND s.id = e.snapshot_id
ORDER BY e.event_date DESC
